scripts.network: npm run build:happ && BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) INTERNAL_IP=$(internal-ip --ipv4) concurrently -k "npm run local-services" "UI_PORT=1420 npm run -w ui start" "npm run launch"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm run test --workspace tests
scripts.start:tauri: AGENTS=${AGENTS:-2} BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(get-port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(get-port) npm run network:tauri
scripts.network:tauri: hc sandbox clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=$(get-port) concurrently "npm run start --workspace ui" "npm run launch:tauri" "holochain-playground"
scripts.launch:tauri: concurrently "hc run-local-services --bootstrap-port $BOOTSTRAP_PORT --signal-port $SIGNAL_PORT" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/forum.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:"$SIGNAL_PORT""
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package --workspace ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.network:android: npm run build:happ && BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) INTERNAL_IP=$(internal-ip --ipv4) concurrently -k "npm run local-services" "UI_PORT=1420 npm run -w ui start" "npm run tauri dev" "npm run tauri android dev"
